author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty One! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independently published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Taking cues from the gonzo Grim-Darkness of Forbidden Psalm or Space Gitz, Untitled Pirate Game is exactly what it says on the tin; a game about Pirates. Not the Pensants kind. The Degenerate kind. Like imagine the smell? Like Willem Dafoe in 'The Lighthouse' kind of gross mariners. They're up to no good. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://scstew.itch.io/untitled-pirate-game
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 042 - UNTITLED PIRATE GAME  by Stewart D'Silva
